alert.note: Alert for Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Glynn County through 815 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Everett to near Thalmann. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Sea Island and Boys Estate. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
